title: 109_hr2319
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction in the current taxable year for the entire adjusted basis of certain qualified property eligible for bonus depreciation allowances. Defines qualified property to include: (1) computer software, water utility property, or qualified leasehold improvement property that has a depreciation recovery period of 20 years or less and that was acquired after May 12, 2005. And (2) certain noncommercial aircraft acquired after May 12, 2005. Permits the use of the percentage of completion accounting method for computing certain depreciation allowances. Allows corporate taxpayers to elect an increased refundable alternative minimum tax credit in lieu of a bonus depreciation deduction.
